general.headline: Founder, Director, CEO at Webmull
general.description:
"Learn, Implement, Upgrade... Repeat" - Best way to become SUCCESSFUL PROFESSIONAL in IT industry. 
- Hemant Pancholi
has experience of over 10+ years & worked in multiple CMMI3 and CMMI5 certified companies after getting double Masters in MCA and MBA respectively. With natural leadership skill, he has gained experience with Agile Scrum process, PM tools like Asana, JIRA and Trello. He has handled multiple projects and teams, and have led them to success.

Hemant also provides services as Trainer & Web Project Consultancy with proper training in Web development and design. 

He founded Webmull with his equally talented (or more, in his own words) wife, Ankita Pancholi, who is a Magento certified developer. The Startup is on growth since and works in different sectors of IT industry. The aim of Webmull is to provide best service, open, honest & transparent communication, professional working environment and growth with competitive rates. 

Hemant has en expertise in Business Development & Management | Web Development & Design | Project Management | Team & Resource Management | Digital marketing.
He has worked with multitude of technologies including Core PHP | OOP PHP | CMS - Drupal | WordPress | Joomla | Magento | Frameworks - Laravel | Yii | CodeIgniter | CakePHP | Zend | Symphony | SEO (On-Page & Off-Page) | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | jQuery | Angular | MySQL | Ajax | Bootstrap | Photoshop | Illustrator | CorelDraw Graphics Suite. 

At Webmull We convert your idea(s) into a reality!

jobs.description:
- After 9 plus years of experience, I decided to initiate my own startup.
- Webmull was founded in 2015 with my wife Ankita Pancholi, A Magento certified developer. 
- We Provide services in PHP, PHP based CMS & Frameworks, JavaScript and it's Frameworks, MySQL, Ajax, HTML, Bootstrap, CSS, OnPage & OffPage SEO service, Digital Marketing, and Graphical tools.
- We use different management tools like Trello, ASANA, Evernote, and Workflowy.
- I provide offline training in PHP, WordPress, Joomla, Drupal and Magento. 
- We believe in Honest, open, Transparent communication with everyone.
- Once this startup reaches on higher level and is stable, we have plans to expand our services in other areas as well.

- I joined Silver Touch as a senior programmer and worked with different Jooma and CodeIgniter projects. 
- After some time, I joined Brodos - a Germany based company which was managed here by Silver Touch, as a Dedicated senior programmer. 
- With Brodos, I worked Zend, Core PHP, Drupal and created Web Applications, Websites and worked with a small ERP product.
- I even worked with different PM tools like JIRA, handled teams, followed Agile, SCRUM process and Deployment & version manager, as well as brief work with PERL.

- I joined Smart Data Enterprises as senior programmer, just after my short tenure with Digicorp. Only after couple of months, due to my work ethic and commitment, I was promoted as Junior team leader.
- I worked with CakePHP, Joomla and WordPress during my time here and created web portals, web applications, and small blogs . 
- As a team leader, I sometimes managed teams consisting 10 members, with 5-6 simultaneous projects. 
- For making many projects success, multiple times, I was nominated for appreciation award, out of which I won 2 times.

- I joined Digicorp as senior programmer.
      

    - Worked with multiple CakePHP projects and had responsibility of team handling and
      
      communications.

- I joined Vyasil as a Programmer after leaving Macrotech. Worked with OOP PHP websites and developed couple of E-commerce websites with it. 
- Learned and worked with 2 Tier Smarty framework, using which, created E-commerce website, Web Portal and some small web applications. 
- During my time here, I even worked with osCommerce, which was quite famous E-commerce platform in that time. I worked on couple of maintenance project of the same here, as well as JavaScript and jQuery.

- I joined Macrotech as trainee for my final year project of MCA, which was of 6 months. Before My training was finished, was hired as junior programmer. 
- I learned & worked with PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, Ajax and concepts of E-Commerce. 
- Left the company to pursue working with other CMS and Frameworks.

Innovify is a product management company that boosts the entire process, whether you’re a start-up or an established business.

general.headline: HR
general.description:
I believe myself, as creativity has no limitation I also never limit myself. Dedicated and Passionate. Objective is to be always best performer with action rather than words. Goal is to be a Good Management Person.

I have chosen HR as my career, because I like to deal with people and I would like to work with manpower. HR is the field, where I can directly connected with people and I have to tackle their issues. HR is the mediator between Management and employees. The main duty of HR is to make employees and management happy.

I have experience of HR field with different industries, Insurance, Automobile, Manufacturing, Education/Institute & IT Software industry. I am a highly motivated professional with a passion for success.I am a good learner. Being an HR, bring positive enthusiasm to the whole team environment is my key responsibility.

MBA(HRM) with 3+ years of experience in Generalist HR profile, Employee Engagement and Performance Management System in managing modern HR Systems with deftness in maintaining
harmonious employee relations through an efficient resolution of employees’ grievances. Proficiency in managing tasks involved in recruitment process including sourcing, screening, shortlisting the candidates, scheduling /conducting interviews and finalizing salaries, Payroll Administration.

jobs.description:
My primary responsibilities are as follows:
**_Recruitment _**
	Managing Consultants.
	Coordinate with various departments for the requirement of Manpower.
	Preliminary screening of profiles.
	Scheduling interview for the candidates.
	Salary comparisons and finalizations.

**_HR Generalist_** 
	Scheduling Induction for New Joiners.
	Introducing the new joiners to the team and introducing them to the departmental representative.
	Preparing Final settlements leave salary and all employee benefits. 
	Compilation & processing of attendance data in attendance system. Processing monthly attendance for Employee. 
	Maintaining employee’s personal files and records, communicating HR policies & across the organization at all levels. Taking care of all employees Leave Applications/Records/Encashment.
	Presenting HR Handbook to the new joiners. Making employees aware of various HR Policies. Review and update HR Policies time to time and implement. Need to make sure that all employees understand and follow it.
	Tracking attendance, maintaining leave records, issue letters, etc.
	Preparation of full and final settlement generation of Experience Letters, Relieving Letters.
	Keeping track of Confirmation, Appraisals, and Increments of employees.
	Administrative work like keeping track of day to day admin work, Maintaining Expense Sheet monthly and yearly basis, Assets Management Etc.
	Helping employees to avail various benefits available to them as and when required.
	Ensuring the performance reviews is done in quart basis of confirmed employees with supervisor and next level supervisor depending upon their KRAs.
	Celebrations - Foundation Day, Independence Day, Diwali and other festivals. Organized & coordinated some events.
	Developing employee engagement programs like Initiated and administered a welcome-mail policy to all new joiners, initiated regular Birthday mailers & celebration policy, management - employee get together, picnics etc.
	Exit Interviews.

The majors roles and responsibilities are mentioned below:-

Support the team by providing full life cycle of recruitment for roles across the organization including conducting interviews to assess candidates; making hiring recommendations; providing support throughout the recruitment process.
 Interviewing candidates on a general basis and for specific role
 Developing and managing ongoing client relationships - both on the phone and face to face
 Ensuring joining documentation including offer & appointment letters and post joining procedures
 Job posting on job sites e.g. Naukri.com and Timesjobs.com
 Training & Motivating New Joiners & Preparing weekly, monthly reports of recruitment. (MIS)
 Participate in Business development activities as and when required


 Clients Handled:

 Gujarat Machinery Ltd
 Silicon IT Hub Pvt. Ltd.
 Advanced Hair Studios
 Torrent Power
 Anchor World
 Malwa institute of Technology
 Liverpool Retail India ltd
 Shivam Water Treaters Pvt Ltd
 Peguine Education Academy
 HDFC Finance
 NIFD (National Institute of Fashion Design)
 Arena Animation etc.,

My responsibilities are as below.

• Sourcing Resumes from the Job Portals 
• Interacting with candidates on call 
• Line up the interview 
• Follow ups 
• Closer

general.headline: HR | Business Development Manager @Qrious Tech

jobs.jobTitle: Human Resources Specialist | Business Development Manager

jobs.description:
"Stegowl" being one of the growing Information Technology Organization highly concentrate on working on new and innovative and challenging projects where we help our personnel to grow interpersonal skills and extra personnel skills. We give every possible chance of exposure to new technologies to our personnel and we help them out with the same.

We generally concentrate on following technologies;-

1. Android and IOS Application Development

2. Game (Mobile and Desktop) Development.

3. Amazon Web service deployment (AWS).

4. MVC and HMVC Development.

5. Google Cloud Deployment and Development

6. Search Engine Optimization and Social Media Marketing

7. MQL5 Development and EA Meta Traders Development.


We mainly focus on following:

1. Customer Satisfaction.

2. B to B and B to C relationship.

3. support them to grow in the market.

4. Developing skills of the personnel associated with us.

5. Inter personal and extra personnel skills of every individual.


My Roles and Responsibility in STEGOWL are: 

1) Administer compensation, benefits and performance management systems, and safety and recreation programs.

2) Identify staff vacancies and recruit, interview and select applicants.

3) Allocate human resources, ensuring appropriate matches between personnel.

4) Provide current and prospective employees with information about policies, job duties, working conditions, wages, opportunities for promotion and employee benefits.

5) Perform difficult staffing duties, including dealing with understaffing, refereeing disputes, firing employees, and administering disciplinary procedures.

(6) Plan and conduct new employee orientation to foster positive attitude toward organizational objectives.

(7)Maintain records and compile statistical reports concerning personnel-related data such as hires, transfers, performance appraisals, and absenteeism rates.

(8) Conduct exit interviews to identify reasons for employee termination.etc.

1) Handling Entire Recruitment cycle, Joining Process, Employee Induction and Administration.

2) Preliminary Short listing of the candidates through telephonic interview and final round of interviews.

3) Employee Management and Engagement activities.

4) Maintain records and compile statistical reports concerning personnel-related data such as hires, transfers, performance appraisals, and absenteeism rates.

5) Maintain records of attendance of employee and personnel-related data such as hires, transfers, performance appraisals, and absenteeism rates.

6) Analyze training needs to design employee development.

7) Identify staff vacancies and recruit, interview and select applicants.

8) Develops and maintains a human resources system that meets top management information needs.

9) Plans and conducts new employee orientation to foster positive attitude toward Company goals.

10) Exit Formalities and Exit Interviews

general.headline: Planning / project engineer at Electrotherm ( india ) Limited.
general.description: Experienced Project Planning Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the machinery industry. Skilled in Production Planning, Product Marketing, Marketing, Project Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. Strong operations professional with a 12 science focused in science from muktajivan high school.

jobs.description:
	Monitoring and controlling all the activities receiving from the P.O copy to material inward to the completion of final product and dispatch.
	Analysis of drawing / design for standardization of product to reduce cycle time and make fastest delivery & decision over bought out or labour.
	Preparing of indents materials and sketches for all the bought out items for U-stamp and other jobs.
	Prepare and Maintain On-line register of Forgings ( Std – Non std ), Tubes, Fittings.
	Plan the jobs for contact base In-house, Outsource parts items.
	Preparing the activity sheet / bar chart for the projects & follow up.
	Develop and maintain of Indent Status.
	Issue forgings, fittings, tubes material within 1 day after receiving information from Store department.
	Release of material marking/cutting & M/C sketches to the production dept. and issuing the material to them.
	Preparation of Deviation / Concession request to get the approval from client / consultant.
	Maintain the record of Material test certificates & materials (forgings, Tubes & fittings.)
	Coordinating with purchase dept. in all technical aspects related to procurement, identify the vendors and their qualification meeting for the requirement.
	Follow-up with supplier purchase, customer, design, site and shop floor and arranges for review meeting & vendor development.
	Arrange for the inspection of job. (client / third party / internal inspection)
	Analysing project delay & its Improvement.

	Manpower planning & Machine planning, scheduling, monthly planning, weekly planning, and daily planning.
	Tool, fixture, insert, material planning.
	Achieve production norms in machining with team of  2  engg.& 40 workers.
	Daily rejection & rework review
	Corrective & preventive action on Rework & rejection.
	Daily Production review.
	Action plan on losses to improve availability, performance
	Maintain documents & data control(Formats )
	Maintaining & taking follow up of tooling with purchase.
	Multiskilling of operator.
	Handle machines maintenance cnc / vmc division.

	Planning and implementing proactive / predictive / preventive / shut down maintenance schedules for machinery so as to increase machine up-time / equipment reliability
	Mechanical Maintenance of all rotating and static equipment installed. 
	Process equipment like reactors, pumps, heat exchangers, filters, etc…  
	Spare parts identification, planning and history generation. 
	Man power management, Execution & documentation work for maintenance.
	Daily maintenance report fill & reporting to shift incharge.
	Analysis of breakdown & solve routine problem.

allSkills: Project Planning, Mechanical Engineering, Materials, Project Engineering, Plant Maintenance, Production Planning, Quality Assurance, Quality Control, Project Management, Commissioning, Maintenance & Repair, PPC, Marketing, Product Marketing

•	Recruiting, scheduling and interviewing candidates and discussing offer and issuing offer letter.
•	Completely responsible for the Induction/Orientation programmes for new recruits.
•	Identifying training needs and imparting training across several levels through gauging skills required for particular positions and analyzing the existing level of competencies of employees vis-à-vis the gaps.
•	Identifying manpower requirements through skills identification and gap analysis and articulating the same to senior management.
•	Evaluating and facilitating continuous improvement of employees against the organization’s pre-defined goals and targets.
•	Playing an integral role in HR functions such as job rotation, negotiating and amicable settling of employee issues and ensuring healthy employee-management relations.
•	Monitoring the performance of team members to ensure efficiency in sales operations and realization of individual and group targets.
•	Organizing employee welfare, development, recreational and social activities.
•	Motivating employees to walk the extra mile by providing proper counseling, communicating the organization’s philosophy and ensuring that individual and organizational philosophies fall in line together.

jobs.description:
•	End-to-end Human Resource Management, covering all facets of HR within the
      organization
      

    •	Managing a team of recruiters and payroll executives
      

    •	Working in the capacity of a Senior HR Lead

•	Working as Manager – HR, with technical and non-technical recruitment and all generalist functions (induction, training, grievance handling, salary processing, attendance & leave register, exit interviews, etc.) being primary responsibilities
•	Recruitment - Recruited across functions, conducted campus recruitments, managed Bring-a-buddy programs, liaising with HR consultancies, etc.
•	Leave Management - Maintain employee leave register, check daily attendance of multiple branches
•	Payroll Management - Design salary structure, prepare salary slips, salary processing, prepare all bank documents related to salary.
•	Employee Engagement- Organize different kind of activities in the company for e.g. Hackathon, Tech talk, Fun, Symposium etc., Retention and Exit interview formalities.
•	Performance Management- Evaluate quarterly performance of employees and Processing Appraisal
•	Handling Corporate Insurance- Awareness about insurance benefits to employees, applications processing, claims handling etc.

•      Responsible for building the Human Capital structure from ground up.
•	Identifying the need for new talent and recruiting the same. Planning and organizing induction and training programs and ensuring high employee retention levels.
•	Effective management of employee induction programmes, and ensuring conformity with the organization’s objectives and policies (COC – Code of Conduct)
•	Payroll Management, Employee Engagement and Retention, Performance Management, Grievance Handling, also, parts of Company Accounting.

jobs.jobTitle: Freelance Recruitment and adhoc HR Consulting
jobs.description: Acted as a freelance HR consultant for various IT/ITES companies.

•	Managing and operating within a team of 65+ call center executives, training and coaching them in various products that our client wishes to market.

general.description: Aahva Chandra is a Business Development Manager for ICOReviewer with years of experience in generating Business for the firms. A leading expert in Bitcoin, Blockchain and Crypto industries, Aahva is at the very heart of revolutionizing the financing industry across the globe and currently consults and advises for a range of multi-million dollar companies. She had worked with more than 15 ICOs uptill now. She had reviewed 50+ ICOs and is focused on creating a vast community of people who are involved in Crypto Market in India. She intimately understands the opportunities and challenges that come from running a platform that reaches millions of people per day. She is having a lots of people currently involved with her in the Crypto World on her social media profiles. Aahva now focuses on the Blockchain industry and offers advice, consulting services, connections to Blockchain experts and investor relations strategies.

general.headline: Sr. Export Manager at MILAN SEEDS CORPORATION [INDIA] PVT. LTD.
general.description:
I am presently associated with MILAN SEEDS CORPORATION [INDIA] PVT. LTD. as a Sr. Export Manager, having exclusive knowledge of approx. 3.8 years in International Marketing, Generating Sales team ensuring compliance to all export objectives, developing sales strategies and new sales opportunities, target marketing, negotiation with customers, satisfying customers requirement, and  Pre / Post Export Documentation & Procedures, Shipping Instruction, Logistics.
I see myself as a Competent, diligent, responsible and independent woman holding an accountable position in an organization through my commitment, dedication, loyalty and strong aptitude for Administration. 
My professional interests are learning new things and update myself regularly with knowledge of my filed, bringing continuously innovation in my field of work. Developing and implementing new innovations and technologies, to increase efficiency in current working style of the company.
Possess leadership skills including recognizing strength and weakness of my company and using the strength in most profitable way and covering the weakness to minimize its negative effects.

•	Exhibited in the International Food exhibitions abroad as a representative of the company in ANUGA 2015, GULFOOD MANUFACTURING 2015, and WORLD FOOD MOSCOW 2015. [Responsible from Booking of stall to the exhibition, includes stall booking, accommodation, travelling, finalizing decorations and layout of the stall, inviting foreign customers and also closing the business deals while meeting up the them, representing company on exhibition].

•	Visited in the International Food exhibitions abroad as a representative of the company in GULFOOD 2013

jobs.description:
JOB RESPONSABILITIES:
•	Primarily responsibility starts from Developing effective and professional relationship with foreign customers, negotiation, Contracts, following-up of contract execution, shipping operations, Export documentation, ensuring smooth delivery based on contract, follow-up settlement of payment and fulfill compliances required in international business.


•	Generating Sales team ensuring compliance to all export objectives. Providing effective and inspirational leadership to the team through regular training, motivation and performance appraisals in order to achieve set targets in sales volumes and providing induction training to new employees.

•	Dealing with Companies based in FAR EST, MIDDLE EAST and EURPOE UNION COUNTIRES.

•	Leverage my technical and industry-specific knowledge to develop strategic business development plans and B2B sales strategies, Building up new marketing plans with special promotions strategies to strengthen the brand image, sales turnover and customer satisfaction.

•	Monitoring overall functionality with respect to each customer & working towards improvements to achieve maximum customer satisfaction with continuously bringing innovations and technologies.
•	Handling Export oriented documentation such as Generating Invoice, Bill of Exchange, Shipping Instructions according to Letter of Credit Instruction or Non LC’s, 100% CAD thru Bank, FAXING OF OBL COPY,DA/DP & Other credit terms,. Preparing Proforma Invoices & Sales Contract for foreign Buyers. Coordinating CHA (fright clearing and handling agents), Shipping Lines for Freight Negotiation, coordinating Laborites and government agencies for issuing certificates required to export our products, Maintaining Export files & records.

•	Keeping in contact with all government and non-government services such as APEDA, IOPEPC, SPICE BORAD, ITPO, ITC.

allSkills: Export, International Sales, Marketing Strategy, Market Research, International Marketing, Marketing Management, Business Strategy, Marketing, Market Analysis, Product Marketing, Corporate Communications, Negotiation
